trends: There have been no other sightings in Denny
This sighting has never been favorited.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting Details It had just got dark when me and another person ( My girlfriends brothers friend ) were outside the front door and talking about seeing shooting stars at different times in the passed couple of weeks when suddenly a very bright light caught my eyes coming from the north . I pointed at it saying it was pretty high up to be a helicopter ( because it started to just hover ) and there was no sound to this light . It seemed way to close to earth and the light way too bright to be a sattelite ( i often see sattelites looking at the night sky and often map the night sky on my Starry Night program on my computer ) It is rare to see any aircraft at our location in the trinity alps of the New River . Suddenly the light zig zagged right to left , right to left so fast ( I have never seen anything move so fast ) then suddenly stop and go straight up out of our atmosphere leaving a small vapor trail ( The object emitted no vapor trail until its sudden lightening speed departure into space ). We both yelled out Oh MY GOD ! THAT WAS A UFO ! I thought to myself maybe it is some new technology we have , but then thought why would something humans made have to leave our atmosphere so suddenly . The object made no sound moving or hovering . It was hard to determine the size as although it was clearly in our airspace ( About half the altitude of a high flying commercial jet ) it was only visable as a very bright light . It took me this long to report it because I thought it was insignifucant compared to other reports , but it was an event I will never forget .
Summary: Me and another person witness a ufo event at beggining of nighttime
